title: Interpretation of the appearance of pimples on the body in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the appearance of pimples on the body for a single woman: When free people see pimples in a dream on her body, it indicates auspicious visions of joy and happiness for the girl, success, and excellence. Then if he sees them on her face, this is evidence of her graduation from the scientific field with distinction. It also indicates a connection with the man she knows and loves in a short period of time. Where many pimples spread on the body of an unmarried girl in a dream, this indicates a strong idea of ​​having a relationship with someone. But circumstances prevent them from bonding with each other. Then if these pimples appear on the hand and in the facial area, this is evidence of stability and security for her psychological state as well as for her family. Also, when you see white pimples in a dream spread across the body, this is evidence of the approaching days of joy, contentment, and connection with a pious and gentle person who knows God and fears Him during them. Then, if an unmarried woman sees brown pimples on her body, this means that there has been envy for a long time. As for the presence of brown pimples on the body For an unmarried woman, it is evidence of the evil surrounding her, and of the actions that harm her, until evil harms her. Interpretation of seeing birth control pills on the chest in a dream for a single woman: I mean the appearance of pills in the chest area. Single women are considered among the things that cause them anxiety. Then it indicates On connection, joy and contentment. When lumps appear on the chest, they indicate the transition to a better and better life. As well as entering a period of happiness and prosperity. As for the appearance of pimples on a man’s chest, this indicates a high status. It also indicates the strength that must be gained. The appearance of lumps on the breast For an unmarried girl, this is evidence of nutrition, abundance of wealth, and marriage in a short time. While spreading a lot of pimples on the girl’s body is evidence of happiness in the days that are approaching her, and abundant means of livelihood for her. When an unmarried girl dreams of pimples appearing on her chest, this is evidence of She will gain a lot and a lot of money in a short period of time. As for the appearance of pimples on his chest, this indicates the seriousness of the fortuneteller’s work. Interpretation of a dream about boiling in a dream for a single woman. Preparing a vision of boiling for one girl in a dream is evidence of her various joys. Then the many boils show the joy and goodness that she will receive. It states In a dream for a bachelor, boils on the body indicate a passionate love relationship and it will end with a happy marriage and happiness for her heart. But if he sees them in his hand, this is evidence of the approaching pleasure and joy, and pleasant skin for a happy marriage with a generous man. Where is the vision? Boiling with pus In the dream, this indicates excellence and continued success , overcoming difficulties and achieving desires. Seeing boils in the mouth of an unmarried girl is evidence of marriage to a righteous man. Interpretation of a dream about pus coming out of the breast of a divorced woman. When you see someone separated from a husband in a dream, blood coming out of his chest, this is evidence of the suffering he experienced in the previous period. Where do you see one? Especially in a dream, pus and pus come out of the chest, and this is evidence of marriage to another person who fears God and is religious. Interpretation of seeing boils in the abdomen in a dream If a pregnant woman sees boils appearing in a dream on her

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a butcher in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a butcher in a dream, a craft that a person knew at that time due to his need for food, then over the centuries it became a profession as it is called a butcher or a welder, who sells and cuts meat for people, but the butcher is seen in a dream with many evidence and indicators, as many scholars have explained regarding It is related to seeing a butcher in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a butcher by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin explained in the interpretation books that he saw a butcher in a dream and actually referred to the angel of death. Seeing a butcher in a dream means treating a disease. Seeing slaughtering or skinning in a dream of animals that cannot be slaughtered indicates To injustice in reality. Seeing a son slaughtering his father in a dream indicates his relationship with virtue. Seeing a butcher in a dream indicates the seriousness of many issues in life. Seeing an imprisoned butcher in a dream means that he has already been released from prison. Seeing a butcher covered in blood indicates Criminal bloodshed. Seeing a dreamer cut into human flesh means gossip. Interpretation of a dream about a butcher for a single woman: Seeing a single woman in a butcher shop in a dream indicates her good luck. Also, seeing meat in reality symbolizes money. Seeing single people slaughtered indicates safety and comfort. If an unmarried woman sees meat and does not buy it, it is a disgusting sight for her. Seeing single men working in a butcher shop indicates marriage or a trip to it. Interpretation of a dream about a butcher for a married woman: For a married woman, seeing a butcher shop in a dream is Good news that good things will come to her. It also indicates seeing a butcher in a dream who is married for the sake of goodness and living. For a married woman to see as if her husband was a butcher, it means that he is wealthy. Interpretation of a dream about a butcher for a pregnant woman: But seeing a butcher in a dream appears to the pregnant woman About her and her unborn well-being.

title: I dreamed that I had long hair

preview.html: I dreamed that I had long hair in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Long hair is a source of attractiveness and beauty, so women take good care of their hair so that it becomes long, shiny and attractive. Today, through this article, we will present to you I dreamed that I had long hair according to great translators such as Ibn Sirin. Ibn Kathir and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the status of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I had long hair by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a dreamer with long, black hair in a dream. It indicates very good and abundant food for the dreamer. Seeing long and soft hair in a dream is It indicates a hoarse voice and a healthy body free of diseases, and God knows best. Long and curly hair in a dream indicates the appearance of some pressures in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a sick person with long hair in a dream indicates that God will soon heal him from this disease, and God knows best. Long hair in a dream indicates that God The dreamer will be granted a lot of goodness, sustenance and blessing in his life. Read another explanation: I dreamed that I dyed my hair. I dreamed that I had long hair according to Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi will interpret seeing long hair in a dream. It indicates the abundance of goodness, blessings and sustenance in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a poor man with long hair in a dream indicates that God He will be blessed with a lot of money and prosperity in his life. Long, thick hair in a dream indicates many worries and concerns in the dreamer’s life, and God knows best. Read another explanation: I dreamed that my hair had fallen out. I dreamed that I had long hair. Seeing an unmarried woman with long hair in a dream announces that the coming period of her life It will be full of happiness, joy and pleasure. Long hair in one dream says that she is a kind-hearted girl who is loved among people. Seeing one person combing her long hair in a dream shows that he will get married soon and live a happy and stable life. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream someone cutting her long hair, this indicates that she Emotionally linked to an inappropriate and lying person. I dreamed that I had long hair for a married woman. Seeing a married woman with long hair in a dream indicates that God will carry her soon, and God knows best. Long and soft hair in a dream for a married woman indicates that her husband fulfills all her desires and lives with him in luxury and happiness. Seeing a woman A married woman with long hair in a dream announces the great love relationship between her and her husband. Read another explanation: I dreamed that I was cutting my hair. I dreamed that I had long hair while I was pregnant. Seeing a pregnant woman with long hair in a dream announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Long hair in a pregnant woman’s dream also indicates that she You will go through an easy birth process without feeling pain or fatigue. Seeing a pregnant woman with long, black hair in a dream indicates that she will feel comfortable, safe, and secure during this time. I dreamed that I had long hair for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman with long hair in a dream indicates very good and abundant food for this period. Next. Long, wavy hair in a dream that is split. This indicates that she will face some problems in her life, and God knows best. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing my long hair in a dream. We are happy.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing corn on the stalk in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see pills on the leg in a dream. In this article we present to you the interpretation of the dream of seeing pills on the leg area in a dream in all cases. Interpretation of the dream of seeing birth control pills on the leg in a dreamIf a married woman dreams of birth control pills near her feet, this is a sign That she will live a happy life. As for the student who sees birth control pills appearing in the leg area during his sleep, this is an indication that this student is doing everything necessary to succeed in his studies. In general, seeing beans in a dream indicates activity and vitality in the dreamer. It indicates that the student is an active and diligent person. Interpretation of a dream about seeing pills on the hand in a dream: Seeing pills on the hand in a dream is a praiseworthy vision that brings with it good for the student. Seeing birth control pills in an employee’s dream is an indication that this employee will soon receive a promotion at work, and God is The Most High and Knowledgeable. If the merchant sees in his dream that there are pills in his hand, this is a sign that he will earn a lot of money in his trade in the coming days, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about pills on the face in a dream. If the sleeper sees in his dream a pill on his face, this is a sign However, he truly loves a woman and submits to her so that she can control him and his life. As for the sleeper who sees in his dream that his face is full of pimples everywhere, this is a sign of this person’s respect and appreciation by people. Seeing pimples on the face indicates prestige and respect for the dreamer in life. His real life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing birth control pills in a dream. If the sleeper sees in his sleep the appearance of blisters on his back, this is an unpleasant vision at all. Seeing birth control pills in a dream indicates the presence of marital problems between the husband and his wife. Seeing black spots in a dream is evidence of sin. And sins and immoralities. Interpretation of a dream about seeing beans in a dream. If a person sees in his dream large red beans in the area of ​​the head, this is a sign that he will be granted a righteous son who will become a scholar, God willing. But if the student in a serious dream eats and comes out of these beans, then this is evidence of his forbidden wealth. God forbid. Seeing birth control pills in a husband’s dream is evidence of his wife’s love for him and his deep appreciation for her. Interpretation of a dream about seeing stomach pills in a dream. If a girl sees a pot in her dream with pimples in the hand area, this is a sign that this girl is suffering from health problems, but these problems It will pass safely, God willing. As for a married woman who sees birth control pills in her stomach in a dream, this is evidence that God Almighty will grant her a child soon. If the sleeper sees in his dream that there are pills in his stomach, then this vision indicates gaining money and having fun with his family. Interpretation Dream of seeing black beans in a dream: If a pregnant woman sees in her sleep the appearance of black pimples on the facial area, this is an indication of the difficulty of childbirth and the past difficult days. If the pimples are black and present on the body, this indicates the presence of a male. But if one sees black pimples in his dream, It means that the student is committing sins and must renounce

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about ants

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about ants: Seeing ants in a dream is considered one of the dreams that has many different positive interpretations that portend good, including negative ones that portend evil, depending on the type of dreamer, whether he is a man, woman, girl, or others, and his condition, and we will learn in detail all the explanations related to this matter.Interpretation Dream of ants: Seeing ants in a dream indicates continuous effort, hard work, and diligence until a person achieves everything he desires to achieve. Seeing ants in a dream is a sign of the lawful money he seeks to earn from his work. Ants in a dream also indicate abundant money that a person will soon gain as a result of his efforts. Continuous. Seeing ants in a dream indicates achieving goals and success after a long period of fatigue and suffering. But if you see ants in a dream biting the dreamer, this is a sign of deception and deception that he will be exposed to by someone close to him. Seeing ants in a man’s dream is a sign of His good qualities and that he is a good person and loved by those around him. Interpretation of a dream about an ant by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing ants in a dream as promising signs because they indicate the coming blessing for the dreamer. Seeing ants in a dream indicates piety and stability in the dreamer’s affairs and his distance from the sins and transgressions he commits. A person’s dream of ants is a sign of success and achieving goals that he has been striving for for a long time. Seeing ants in a dream means obtaining a job or a promotion in the current field of work in appreciation of one’s continuous efforts. In the event that a person sees ants and their color is red, this is an undesirable sign. Favorable because it shows the dreamer’s fear of something in the future. Ants in a dream indicate recovery from diseases and getting rid of health crises that have plagued the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about an ant for a single woman: Seeing a single girl in a dream about ants, and they were present in abundance, symbolizes that there are many Many people are trying to approach her and deceive her. A girl’s dream of ants while she is carrying food indicates abundant goodness that will come to her soon and the success that she will achieve soon, God willing. A girl’s dream of ants is an indication that she will soon marry a man of good morals and religion. The girl sees in a dream ants walking on her bed. This is a sign of the crises and problems that she faced, which greatly hindered her life. However, if a girl sees ants swallowing her, this is a sign of the disease that she is suffering from. Interpretation of a dream about an ant for a married woman: Seeing ants in a married woman’s dream indicates the stability of her married life. A married woman’s illness due to ants in The dream is a sign of the abundant goodness that will come to her and the money that she will obtain in the future. A married woman who sees ants in a dream indicates that she will give birth to a child after a short period of waiting. In the case of a married woman who sees ants coming out of her clothes, this is a sign of sadness and crises that She is experiencing it at this time in her life. A married woman who sees ants standing upright is a sign of poverty and problems that she faces.

title: Interpretation of a dream about burning breasts in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about burning breasts in a dream. There are many meanings that express burning, so in the following lines we will learn about the interpretation of dreams about burning breasts in a dream, all of this and more details.. Interpretation of dreams about burning breasts in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about burning breasts in a dream can be a sign of relationships. Failed romance, and God knows best. If a single girl sees a burnt breast in a dream, this may represent a failed emotional relationship, and God knows the unseen. When she sees a burnt breast in a dream, it may be a sign of late marriage, and God is Most High and Knows. Interpretation of a dream of burning a child’s hand in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of burning a child’s hand in a dream, A fire in a child’s hand can indicate bad things, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a married man sees himself burning a child’s hand in a dream, this may indicate his shortcomings in the rights of his children, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself burning a child’s hand in a dream, he can express Rulings, and God knows best. If a young man sees in a dream a child’s hand being burned, this may indicate goodness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a fire without fire in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a fire without fire in a dream could be an indication of actions that must be paid attention to, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees a fire in A dream without fire, this may indicate bad behavior that he is performing and he must return, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees in a dream a fire without fire in the house, it may be a sign of ongoing problems with her husband, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about fire at a wedding party in a dream could be Interpretation of dreaming about fire at a wedding in a dream is a sign of judgments, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. However, seeing fire coming out of a marriage can be a sign that you will be freed from problems, and God knows the unseen. When you see the fire being extinguished in marriage, it may be a sign of liberation from evil, God willing. If he sees The married man himself extinguishing the fire in marriage in a dream, this may indicate good changes, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing Mount Arafat in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Many are interested in the interpretation of seeing Mount Arafat in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi are considered the most famous scholars in interpreting many visions and dreams, and in this article we examine their interpretation of seeing Mount Arafat. Falling from the sky, where seeing Mount Arafat is one of the most promising visions according to the interpretation of many scholars because it has great religious value. Read more: The Project in a DreamInterpretation of seeing Mount Arafat in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-NabulsiInterpretation of seeing Mount Arafat in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-NabulsiAs we mentioned previously, seeing Mount Arafat in a dream indicates good news and good things such as performing Hajj for the pioneer, especially if the dreamer desires to perform Hajj and prays a lot to God with this desire. There are also many interpretations of seeing Mount Arafat in a dream, depending on the condition of the viewer, and this is according to the opinion of scholars. Whereas standing on Mount Arafat portends the loss of a husband or wife, it may also indicate your victory over an enemy. It is worth noting that the interpretation of seeing many visions varies depending on the condition of the person having the vision, as it is one of the factors on which the interpretation of the vision depends. Read more: A piano in a dream The interpretation of seeing Mount Arafat by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin is also considered one of the most famous scholars in the science of interpreting various visions and has many books In the science of interpreting visions and dreams, below we will discuss Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing Mount Arafat, which came as follows: Muhammad Ibn Sirin explained that seeing Mount Arafat in a dream means good news, as it indicates that the dreamer will perform Hajj soon. Seeing Mount Arafat in The dream means that the dreamer desires to perform God’s duty and wants to obey God Almighty. Ibn Sirin interpreted the Hajj rituals to indicate the dreamer’s long life and the end of the dreamer’s life. In the event that the dreamer is seen standing alone on Mount Arafat, it may indicate the dreamer’s approaching death, and it may also indicate On his recovery from an illness, as well as the return of the absent person, and God knows best. Read more: Seeing pins in a dreamInterpretation of seeing Mount Arafat by Al-NabulsiThere are also many people interested in interpreting various dreams and visions, and in this article we discuss the interpretation of seeing Mount Arafat in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, and after discussing the interpretation Ibn Sirin to see Mount Arafat. Here is an explanation of the interpretation of the vision of Mount Arafat according to Al-Nabulsi’s vision, which is as follows: Al-Nabulsi interpreted the vision of Mount Arafat as a sign of the arrival of goodness to the dreamer. It also indicates the fulfillment of desires and goals, the removal of worries, the treatment of diseases, the repayment of debts, and the achievement of great profits. Read more: Backgrounds in a dream Interpretation of the vision of Mount Arafat for a woman Single Woman: After discussing the interpretation of seeing Mount Arafat in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, we next discuss the interpretation of seeing Mount Arafat for an unmarried woman, which is as follows: Seeing Mount Arafat in a dream for single people indicates good news in the coming period. It also indicates a close marriage with a righteous person. It also indicates good news in the coming period. Climbing Mount Arafat indicates the achievement of many goals for single people, whether in romantic or academic life, and God knows best. Interpretation

title: Interpretation of seeing the dead leaving in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person escaping in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of seeing a dead person escaping in a dream. It is one of the dreams that make the dreamer feel very anxious, but they want to know an explanation for that, so we will get to know it. Its interpretation is in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some working scholars and website owners. They do not have any involvement in the interpretations, but rather quote the scholars’ interpretations. Interpretation of seeing the dead leaving in a dream: If one sees that the deceased was leaving in a dream, this may indicate the bad psychological state that the dreamer is suffering from at that time. Seeing a dead man escaping may indicate some problems and fears that the dreamer faces in his life during those days. Seeing a dead man escaping in a dream may mean that the dreamer will face some difficult changes in his life at that time. When you see a dead man escaping in a dream, this may indicate To bad events that may happen to the dreamer in his life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the dead asking for forgiveness from those living in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that the dead person asked him to forgive him, it is possible that he needed charity at that time, and God knows best. This may indicate The living person asking the dead person to ask forgiveness for his need for supplication in those days. Anyone who sees in a dream that the deceased was asking the living person to forgive him may indicate the difficulties that the dreamer may face in his life at that time, and he must ask for God’s help. Dreaming of a dead person asking forgiveness from a living person may indicate changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a deceased person buying new clothes for himself in a dream Seeing a deceased person buying new clothes in a dream may indicate the cover that the dreamer gains during this period, thanks to God. A dream about a deceased person presenting the dreamer with new clothes may indicate the abundance of money that the dreamer obtains at that time, thanks to God. If the deceased sees that the deceased was buying new clothes, this may indicate the blessings that he enjoyed, and God knows best. To see yourself buying new clothes In a dream, it may indicate good things to come and happiness that will come to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about burying the dead inside the house in a dream: In the event that a person sees the deceased buried inside the house, this can indicate that the dreamer is traveling or working far from his family. Dreaming of burying the dead inside the house in a dream may indicate a wedding date or upcoming joy for the people of the house, thanks to God. If you see in a dream burying the deceased inside the house and the people of the house are crying, this may indicate changes that are occurring in the lives of the people of the house at that time and they must To ask for God's help. . If a person sees burying the dead inside the house in a dream, this may indicate the problems that the people of the house faced at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the deceased sad and crying in a dream. It is possible that seeing the deceased is sad and crying may indicate worries and problems that the dreamer faces. In his life during this period, it may indicate crying

title: Interpretation of dreams about the living giving the dead banknotes by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Explanation of the living giving to the dead. Interpretation of the dream of the living giving the dead banknotes. Who among us has not seen his deceased relatives in a dream, we find that their presence in visions has many meanings, especially when we take anything from the dreamer or give him money and gifts, and today we will learn about its interpretation. The living receives the dead banknotes. What is the interpretation of a dream about the living giving the dead banknotes? We see that the dreamer is happy with the deceased’s gift to him, but if he sees that he is the one giving it, then he feels anxious and afraid of the outcome of this dream, and the jurists said that the dream indicates: -Hearing news Unpleasant and sad, it hurts him psychologically and physically. The strong desire of the dead person to give the dreamer some alms for his soul, or to pray for him constantly, to pass this pain that he feels in the afterlife. Perhaps it is an expression that the dreamer is going through a major failure in his life, and this makes him lose a lot of money, He cannot bear it and is affected by fatigue no matter what happens. The vision does not bode well for the student, as when he sees it it may indicate that he has not achieved and failed in the subjects he studies throughout the year, so he must pay attention to what follows and understand his studies in a deeper way without anyone being affected. As we find This vision also has a sad connotation for the merchant, as it indicates a major loss in his trade and work as a result of the difficulties he went through in the previous period. This may indicate that he will mourn the death of a relative or friend at this time. This vision confirms that the dreamer will be exposed to a mine that he did not He collides with him before, and he is greatly affected by him and makes him like the dead. What is the interpretation of a dream about the living giving the dead banknotes according to Ibn Sirin? The vision shows the suffering of the dead person, as he prepares for the dreamer to provide him with all means to help him from his pain afterward, and he does not obtain this help except through his continuous supplication, which It will get him out of his painful situation. If he asks for this money, it is necessary to quickly give him alms because he is in dire need of it, and it is the sure solution for God to absolve him of his sins. Likewise, if he asks for this money as a kind of debt, then his vision shows his need for charity that will relieve him of what he is going through. It also expresses that the dreamer is going through some problems and disagreements with the family of the deceased, and these problems may develop into a point of enmity. If he gave him this money and did not take it, his vision confirmed that he is angry because of the shame in some of the actions and behaviors that he carries out in his life, so he must think What his Lord does. . He does not get angry and searches for another path after his repentance to God in order to remain dear to his Lord. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing the dead gives notes to the living. You gave him in a dream a lot of goodness for the dreamer. There is no one who hates nourishment and kindness in his life, so it will be happy news for him to take him out of all Sorrows that happened to him in his life. Renewal and change for the dreamer. If he dreams of a spacious house, he will certainly see him buying the house, and if he desires a perfect job, he gets it immediately. His rejection of money in his vision is not good news for the dreamer, as it portends things that are of no use. The dreamer will not change his life. Interpretation of seeing a dead gift in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq: The vision appears

title: Interpretation of running or jogging - seeing jumping and walking in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about running in a girl’s dream for a single woman on the road for a married woman. Running from one person to a pregnant woman Running with someone Interpretation of seeing running in a dream by Ibn Sirin, running in a dream is one of the dreams that we often see in a dream and it carries many important signs and associations for us in real life, as many of us constantly think about running. Doing sports and football, or running in order to stay fit, as running is one of the most important things we do in life to have strong health and a wonderful life. Running in a dream is one of the important dreams in our life, which we will study for you in the complete interpretations of the interpreter Ibn Sirin, the international interpreter of dreams. Seeing running, jogging, running, jumping, jumping in a dream. Whoever dreams that he is running in a dream, his vision indicates that he faces some difficulties and dangers in his life, but he will overcome them. Seeing running and jogging in a dream indicates success and speed in achieving goals and objectives. From He dreams that he is riding on an animal or a horse and running with it, then the dream indicates the achievement of what the dreamer wants to achieve, and it also indicates the disappearance of fear and panic and the achievement of peace and tranquility. Whoever sees in his dream that he is running or jogging and does not wear bare feet, then the dream indicates that he is walking after something. And he wants to complete it as quickly as possible. The person who sees in his dream that he is jumping from one area to another area that is better than this one, the vision indicates that the dreamer’s situation will change for the better and better in the near future. The person who sees in his dream that he is jumping over someone, the vision indicates that That the bird will be able to defeat this person and defeat him, and jumping in a dream shows strength and skill. Whoever sees in his dream that he jumped from the earth to the sky, the dream shows the dreamer’s visitor to the Holy House of God. Whoever sees in his dream that he is jumping on the ground, the Seeing it indicates that some of his worries will be solved for the dreamer, such as part of his money going away, living with the other party, and feeling difficulties and problems. Whoever sees in a dream that he is walking and does not wear shoes or boots (barefoot), then the dream indicates good intentions, the disappearance of distress, and the comfort that comes after Distress. Whoever sees in his dream that he is walking on a straight path and not a winding path, then his vision shows the best of his effort and the intention of his intention. It shows his effort in acquiring Islamic knowledge and also indicates the good that the dreamer acquires. The person who sees in his dream that he is walking on the ground calmly and without arrogance in his walk, The dream shows the dreamer’s humility and good morals. Whoever sees in a dream that he is walking in the markets, his vision indicates that the dreamer carries the will of a dead person if he is suitable for it. Whoever sees in his dream that he is running, his vision shows victory and dominance over competitors and enemies. Interpretation of running in a dream for a single woman. A single girl pursuing a young man she does not know in a dream is evidence that something is controlling her entire thinking. If a girl sees herself pursuing a man and following him in a dream, this means that her desire will come true. Seeing a girl...
